items.content_html: Sudoku Tauri is a cross-platform Sudoku game built using Tauri, TypeScript, and Rust. It provides a clean, modern interface for playing the classic number puzzle game on desktop platforms. The project leverages Tauri's lightweight and secure framework to deliver a fast and efficient application.
items.title: dmdaksh/sudoku-tauri: Sudoku Tauri is a cross-platform Sudoku game built using Tauri, TypeScript, and Rust. It provides a clean, modern interface for playing the classic number puzzle game on desktop platforms. The project leverages Tauri's lightweight and secure framework to deliver a fast and efficient application.
